summary: P0 UI fixes and P1 Change Password API verified successfully. All 3 P0 fixes (logout button green gradient, icon gradients, mobile notifications panel) working correctly. P1 backend change password endpoint fully functional with proper validation.
passed_tests: Backend: 7/7 tests passed for P1 Change Password API
Backend: POST /api/users/me/change-password - Endpoint exists and functional
Backend: Change password rejects wrong current password with 400 error
Backend: Change password validates new password min 8 characters
Backend: Change password success changes password in DB (tested with restore)
Backend: Change password requires authentication (401 without token)
Frontend: P0 #1 - Logout button has green gradient (bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-emerald-600)
Frontend: P0 #2 - 16 settings icons have gradient from-primary to-emerald-600 (matching 'Get Started' button)
Frontend: P0 #3 - Notifications panel on mobile displays properly centered with w-[calc(100%-2rem)] margins
Frontend: Change Password modal calls real API - Shows error toast 'Current password is incorrect' for wrong password
critical_code_review_comments: Good: Logout button correctly uses green gradient (bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-emerald-600) instead of red
Good: SettingsItem component applies consistent gradient to all icons (Lines 103-118 of Settings.jsx)
Good: NotificationsPanel has proper mobile positioning with w-[calc(100%-2rem)] sm:w-full max-w-sm (Lines 593)
Good: ChangePasswordModal calls userApi.changePassword which hits real POST /api/users/me/change-password endpoint
Good: Backend validates current password before allowing change
Good: Backend enforces 8 character minimum on new password

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All P0 and P1 fixes verified

context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 UI fixes (logout button green, icon gradients, mobile notifications) and P1 change password API all working. Settings page uses bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-emerald-600 for all icon backgrounds. Change password modal in Settings.jsx calls userApi.changePassword which posts to /api/users/me/change-password. The endpoint verifies current password and validates new password length.

p0_fix_1_logout_button_green.classes: bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-emerald-600 hover:from-primary/90 hover:to-emerald-600/90 shadow-lg shadow-primary/25

p0_fix_2_icon_gradients.classes: bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-emerald-600 rounded-xl shadow-lg shadow-primary/25

p0_fix_3_mobile_notifications_panel.mobile_styles: w-[calc(100%-2rem)] sm:w-full max-w-sm mt-4 mx-4 sm:mt-16 sm:mr-4
p0_fix_3_mobile_notifications_panel.features: Centered on mobile, proper margins, backdrop blur, close button

mocked_features.mobile_money_disbursement: MOCKED - M-PESA, MTN Mobile Money, Airtel Money APIs
